attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parental Control:
Make parents responsible for the actions of their children upto 16 years of age and equally penalised for misdemeanours. This should include all offences from litter fouling to criminal offences.

rejection.details: The title of the petition must be a call for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
